text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well then. Are your preparations<n>complete, Agnes Tachyon?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I'm ready whenever you are,<n>President.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Agnes Tachyon is the jewel of a<n>distinguished bloodline,
with talent so<n>great that others overlooked her<n>normally
truant behavior.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And she's up against Symboli<n>Rudolf—the Emperor who
reigns over<n>Tracen Academy with her<n>overwhelming
prowess.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And here I am, an unexpected<n>witness to this fight between<n>
titans—the intensity of this race is<n>giving me goosebumps!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Pant... You're the Emperor, allright!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The two are neck and neck, but<n>Symboli Rudolf looks like
she has the<n>upper hand.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And now they're entering the final<n>stretch!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
(The existence of virtual particles that<n>travel faster than light
without<n>contradicting special relativity has yet<n>to be
disproven.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
(The top speed of an Umamusume is<n>theorized to be about
seventy<n>kilometers per hour, but there's no<n>data that
rejects the possibility of<n>overcoming that!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
(Understand? It's about potential! My<n>body—and my
legs—are overflowing<n>with potential!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Agnes Tachyon's expression<n>changes abruptly.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hgh?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Faster! Faster! Faster!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The latent potential within an<n>Umamusume's legs! The limits
of this<n>body's speed!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I've yet to see even a glimpse of<n>either, for I know that they
lie beyond<n>the horizon!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her eyes glitter like those of an<n>innocent girl... or maybe a
deranged<n>scientist drowning in her own desire—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her passion takes my breath away.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant, pant!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'm exhausted! Absolutely incredible,<n>Agnes Tachyon!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh, how nice of you. You are<n>the victor, though.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Only by a nose—Nay, we finished at<n>essentially the same
time. You are a<n>formidable foe.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This is why letting you go would be<n>too great of a loss.
Have you had a<n>change of heart? Perhaps even a<n>little?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Was this run your attempt to make<n>me feel longing for this
academy? If<n>so, I regret to inform you—I've made<n>up my
mind.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I see... Then, what about after hearing<n>his story?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I see... Then, what about after hearing<n>her story?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Whose story?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Whose story?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: ...Hm? What's that look on your face<n>for?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
How should I put this—you look rather<n>impassioned. Perhaps
even driven to<n>madness?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't stop thinking about how<n>Agnes Tachyon ran in that
race just<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And yet she said that her limits lie<n>"beyond the horizon."
Which<n>means—Agnes Tachyon can still run<n>much, much
faster.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Faster! Faster! Faster!
choice_data_list: (I want to see it... I want to see that future!)
(I want to see it... I want to see that future!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hey now, don't play dumb with me!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You want to scout me, don't you?<n>Well, cut it out—I don't
need any more<n>delays to my research.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: That's right, Agnes Tachyon isn'tlooking for a normal trainer. Forher, even daily training is just anotherfacet of her research. In that case...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Eureka, I've got it!
choice_data_list: Do you have any of that medicine on you?
Do you have any of that medicine on you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I do, but what's it to you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I grab the suspiciously-colored<n>medicines right out of Agnes<n>
Tachyon's outstretched hand...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, what?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And finish all three in one gulp!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: ...I'm shocked.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Dare I say, even impressed. Ha... Ha!<n>
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I've never seen such a willing test<n>subject! Were you a
guinea pig in<n>your past life?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You certainly say some delightful<n>things. So you're okay
with being my<n>test subject? You're okay with me<n>
stripping you of your human rights?<n>Heh-heh-heh!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: ...What caused this change of heart?
choice_data_list: I also want to see what lies beyond your limits.
I also want to see what lies beyond your limits.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmmm...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: And there it is. Truly driven to<n>madness, huh? Heh-heh-heh!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Very well. Follow me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Slow on the uptake, aren't you? To<n>the staff room, of
course. I can't drop<n>out if I have a trainer counting on me,<n>
now can I?
choice_data_list: So you accept my scouting offer?
So you accept my scouting offer?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh, you'll be my guinea<n>pig—perhaps even worse
than that.<n>But if you're okay with that, then<n>come with me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I'll show you what lies beyond our<n>limits—what nobody has
yet to<n>witness.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, my days of being<n>experimented upon by Agnes<n>
Tachyon begin!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
...Hm, actually, let's wait a second. At<n>least until the side
effects wear off.<n>It'd be a bother if you caused<n>
unnecessary confusion or chaos.
